channel.title: CVE Feed for Pulse Secure -- Pulse Connect Secure/ Pulse Policy Secure

item.title: CVE-2020-8238|2024-08-04T09:56:27.951Z -- pulse%20secure -- pulse%20connect%20secure%2F%20pulse%20policy%20secure
item.description: A vulnerability in the authenticated user web interface of Pulse Connect Secure and Pulse Policy Secure < 9.1R8.2 could allow attackers to conduct Cross-Site Scripting (XSS).
